name: get_job_status
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool large_text_to_speech.
Tool description: Large text to speech (TTS) API enables you to perform unlimited* text to speech synthesis (English) in single request.  With human like voice quality! Read more in About section.
API description: Fetch the status and results of a job from the Large Text-to-Speech service using RapidAPI.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the job whose status and result need to be fetched.
